com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service

Class SchedulerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service.SchedulerService

  • @Service
public class SchedulerService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs scheduled operations.
    Since:
    2020-05-12
    Author:
    Sujan Kumar Mitra

    • Method Detail

      • refreshArticles

        @Scheduled(cron="0 0 * ? * *")
private void refreshArticles()
                                                      throws NewsNotFoundException
        This method is invoked by the Spring container in a interval of 1 hour.
        Throws:
        NewsNotFoundException - might throw if news is not found.
        Since:
        2020-05-12

      • execute

        private void execute()
        Performs the following operations.
        • Fetches updated news articles from the api and puts it in news map
        • Refreshes headlines list.
        • Refreshes articles of logged in user's custom list
        • Invokes the garbage collector to perform clean up
        Since:
        2020-05-12
        See Also:
        NewsService.getUpdatedArticles(), refreshHeadlines()

      • refreshHeadlines

        private void refreshHeadlines()
        This method refreshes the headlines list.
        Since:
        2020-05-12
        See Also:
        HeadlineService
